name: Draw Near
description: Huge meteorites suddenly collided with your space ship. Due to that shock, your ship is drifting in outer space now. Let's take various actions and survive in the lonely universe! Can you finally return to the earth? Your survival life begins now.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64bit Required) Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3320 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: (Non-VR)Intel® HD Graphics 4000 (VR)NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Internet connection required for synchronizing your data.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64bit Required) Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Internet connection required for synchronizing your data.
